name: Atchoum !
description:
In Atchoum! the goal is to sneeze as hard as you can to make your little character go as fast and as far as you can. At the beginning, you have to bring as much feather as you can to the face of Robert (the character with no arms) and at the end of the 20s, he will sneeze !

RULES :  First 20s ->     Bring as much feather as you can to the face of Robert!Robert Sneeze ->    Watch him and wait for him to fall down :p CONTROLS :  Take a feather ->Hold down the left mouse button and moove itRestart ->Press the restart button GAME :

The game was created by Matteo Benaissa in 3 hours for the Trijam 85 with the theme Hard and Fast.
